scripts.dev: rimraf public && npm run copy:map && vite
scripts.rename: node -e "require('fs').rename('public/index.html', 'public/map.html', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.build: rimraf dist && vite build && npm run copy
scripts.deploy: npm run copy:map && npm run build && surge dist --domain https://map-unipaz.surge.sh
